content.rendered:
Discover a diverse academic community that will nurture and inspire you to achieve beyond imagination.

The University of La Verne is a nonprofit, private university committed to supporting our students as they pursue their passions, grow personally, and prepare for a lifetime of success.

Founded in 1891, the university offers a distinctive, high-quality learning experience in a wide range of academic majors, rooted in a liberal education that embraces four core values: ethical reasoning, diversity and inclusivity, lifelong learning, and civic and community engagement.

Whether you’re looking for the classic university experience on the La Verne Campus or pursuing an accelerated degree as an adult learner at one of our campuses in Central or Southern California, all students receive the personalized advising and academic support that sets a University of La Verne education apart.
